name: tinny

tinny adjective
(SOUND)

tinny adjective
(POOR QUALITY)
informal disapproving If something made of metal is tinny, it is not strong and not of good quality: a cheap, tinny toy car

(of sound) weak and high; lacking a full sound: The music sounded good even on the TV’s tinny speakers.
